titleStmt.title: The second booke of the Garden of wysedome wherin are conteyned wytty, pleasaunt, and nette sayenges of renowmed personages collected by Rycharde Tauerner anno. M.D.XXXIX. Cum priuilegio ad imprimendum solum.
Garden of wysdom. Book 2
titleStmt.author: Taverner, Richard, 1505?-1575.
Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536. Apophthegmata.

notesStmt.note: Actual printer's name and conjectured publication date from STC; publisher's name and place of publication from colophon.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
